    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>en</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Your Opinion (Modul 7 - English C)</string>
            <string language="en">Your Opinion (module 7 - English C)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihre Meinung (Modul 7 - Englisch C)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Votre avis (module 7 - l'anglais C)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sua opinião (módulo 7 - inglês C)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il vostro parere (modulo 7 - inglese C)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Γνώμη σας (ενότητα 7 - αγγλικό Γ)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Su opinión (módulo 7 - inglés C)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">The seven modules of the course contain activities to help you improve your reading, listening, writing and speaking skills in English.English C.</string>
            <string language="en">The seven modules of the course contain activities to help you improve your reading, listening, writing wild duck speaking skills in English.

English C.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">English C</string>
            <string language="sv">english</string>
            <string language="sv">reading</string>
            <string language="sv">listening</string>
            <string language="sv">writing</string>
            <string language="sv">speaking</string>
            <string language="sv">your opinion</string>
            <string language="sv">opinion</string>
            <string language="sv">assigment</string>
            <string language="en">English C</string>
            <string language="en">english</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="en">listening</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="en">speaking</string>
            <string language="en">your opinion</string>
            <string language="en">opinion</string>
            <string language="en">assigment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die sieben Module des Kurses enthalten 
Aktivitäten, um Ihnen zu helfen, Ihren Messwert zu verbessern und 
hören und schreiben sprechende Fähigkeiten der wilden Ente in 
English.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les sept modules du cours contiennent des 
activités pour vous aider à améliorer votre lecture, écoutant, 
écrivant des qualifications parlantes de canard sauvage dans 
English.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os sete módulos do curso contêm atividades para 
ajudar-lhe melhorar sua leitura, escutando, escrevendo habilidades 
faladoras do pato selvagem em English.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I sette moduli del corso contengono le attività 
per aiutarli a migliorare la vostra lettura, ascoltando, scrivendo le 
abilità parlanti dell'anatra selvaggia in English.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επτά ενότητες της σειράς μαθημάτων περιέχουν τις 
δραστηριότητες για να σας βοηθήσουν να βελτιώσετε την ανάγνωσή 
σας, άκουσμα, που γράφει τις άγριες δεξιότητες ομιλίας παπιών 
στο αγγλικό αγγλικό γ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los siete módulos del curso contienen actividades
para ayudarle a mejorar su lectura, escuchando, escribiendo 
habilidades de discurso del pato salvaje en English.English C.</string>
          </description>
